sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Upgrading to UTAH or above, this script will mark the old solution files as inactive.</description> <name>Marks latest VA nlu solutions as active</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var ml_solution_ids = ["eca8be0b87a2551061784085dabb353f", "7d29f64b87a2551061784085dabb35ab", "c65a1ac38762551061784085dabb35d7", "32f9d2c38762551061784085dabb3573", "71ca9ec38762551061784085dabb35e4", "3fbac57e87a2151061784085dabb3529", "d568ba0b87a2551061784085dabb3513", "f869fa4b87a2551061784085dabb3572", "81e8b24b87a2551061784085dabb3591", "796a817e87a2151061784085dabb357c", "df3b8d7e87a2151061784085dabb3546", "0b0c9e078762551061784085dabb35f1", "268b1a078762551061784085dabb3557", "f58c56478762551061784085dabb3545", "15a9fe4b87a2551061784085dabb3523", "5404cdf687a2151061784085dabb3596", "89e6c9ba87a2151061784085dabb35a2"]; for (var i = 0; i < ml_solution_ids.length; i++) { global.MLSolutionUpgradeUtils.setModelIdAsActive(ml_solution_ids[i], "com.glide.cs.nlu.topics"); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-10-21 22:27:55</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b49e257fc3221110634cdb450a40ddc7</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Marks latest VA nlu solutions as active</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">67c239e293400210b31a30dcebba1087</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b49e257fc3221110634cdb450a40ddc7</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-10-24 20:06:30</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Marks latest VA nlu solutions as active
